translations: v．赌博，冒险：以金钱或其他物品为赌注进行游戏或投机，通常涉及到运气和风险。
· He gambled away all his money.
他把所有的钱都输光了。

sentences.sentence: John gambled heavily on the horses.
sentences.translation: 约翰在这几匹马上下了大赌注。

sentences.sentence: I gambled all my winnings on the last race.
sentences.translation: 我把赢了的钱全压在最后一场赛马上了。

sentences.sentence: He gambled on being able to buy a ticket at the last minute.
sentences.translation: 他碰运气看能否在最后时刻买到票。
